== Checkout the code ==

[http://code.google.com/p/swagswap/source/checkout Checkout the code] using Subversion


== Download Google App Engine SDK for Java ==
http://googleappengine.googlecode.com/files/appengine-java-sdk-1.2.5.zip

Unpack it to a directory of your choice.


== Add Environment Variable ==

name={{{GAE_HOME}}}

value=directory where GAE is installed e.g {{{/Users/scott/Work/appengine-java-sdk-1.2.5}}}


== Run ==

Execute {{{runserver}}} Ant task
